name: Peanut Butter Rice Crispy Treats
description: Classic Rice Crispy Treats with Chocolate Topping
instructions: Melt coconut oil, peanut butter, and marshmallows in a medium pot over low heat
Stir until fully melted and smooth
Add rice cereal and mix until evenly coated
Press mixture into a loaf pan lined with parchment paper
Spread melted chocolate chips evenly over the top
